es1000SysBootDate.name: es1000SysBootDate
es1000SysBootDate.description: The date and time of the last IPL.

es1000SysFirmwareVersion.name: es1000SysFirmwareVersion
es1000SysFirmwareVersion.description: The current version of the firmware.

es1000SysTypeNum.name: es1000SysTypeNum
es1000SysTypeNum.description: This object identifies ASCII type number for the unit (ex. 001000).

es1000SysModelNum.name: es1000SysModelNum
es1000SysModelNum.description: This object identifies ASCII model number for the unit (ex. 001).

es1000SysMfg.name: es1000SysMfg
es1000SysMfg.description: This object identifies ASCII manufacturer for the unit (ex. MCD).

es1000SysPlantOfMfg.name: es1000SysPlantOfMfg
es1000SysPlantOfMfg.description: This object identifies ASCII plant of manufacturer for the unit (ex. 01).

es1000SysSeqNum.name: es1000SysSeqNum
es1000SysSeqNum.description: This object identifies ASCII sequence number for the unit (ex. 000000000001).

es1000SysEcLevel.name: es1000SysEcLevel
es1000SysEcLevel.description: This object identifies ASCII EC level ID for the unit (format: xyymmdd, x=millennium).

es1000SysOemSerialNum.name: es1000SysOemSerialNum
es1000SysOemSerialNum.description: This object identifies ASCII OEM serial number for the unit (format: xyymmdd, x=millennium).

es1000SysOperStatus.name: es1000SysOperStatus
es1000SysOperStatus.description: The current operational status of the switch. The values are defined as follows: operational(1), redundant-failure(2), minor-failure(3), major-failure(4), and not-operational(5).

es1000SysState.name: es1000SysState
es1000SysState.description: If the edOperStatus of the switch is operational, the switch will be in one of the four states: online(1), coming-online(2), offline(3), and going-offline(4).

es1000SysAdmStatus.name: es1000SysAdmStatus
es1000SysAdmStatus.description: The desired administrative status of the switch. A management station may place the switch in a desired state by setting this object accordingly. The desired administrative status are online(1) and offline(2). Online means setting the switch to be accessible by an external Fibre Channel port, and offline means setting the switch to be inaccessible.

es1000CompTable.name: es1000CompTable
es1000CompTable.description: A table that contains one entry for each component.

es1000CompEntry.name: es1000CompEntry
es1000CompEntry.description: An entry containing the service parameters of the component.

es1000CompCode.name: es1000CompCode
es1000CompCode.description: Component. A hardware unit of the product. Each component defined in this MIB has a fixed COMPONENT code, except for port components which vary based on the installed GBIC. The values are defined as follows: comp-ctp(2), comp-fan(5), comp-power(6), comp-thermal(13), comp-gbic-none(16), comp-gbic-cu-db9(17), comp-gbic-cu-hssdc(18), comp-gbic-opt-lw-1g(19), comp-gbic-serial(20), comp-gbic-opt-sw-1g(21), comp-gbic-opt-lw-2g(22), comp-gbic-opt-sw-2g(23)

es1000CompPosition.name: es1000CompPosition
es1000CompPosition.description: This object identifies the position of the component. CTP components start from 1 to 1, fans from 1 to 6, power supplies from 1 to 2, thermal sensors from 1 to 1, port GBICs from 1 to 9.

es1000CompStatus.name: es1000CompStatus
es1000CompStatus.description: This object identifies the operational status of the component. The active(1) state indicates that the current component is active. The update-busy(2) state indicates that the component is in the updating process. The failed(3) state indicates the current component is failed.

es1000PortBportCount.name: es1000PortBportCount
es1000PortBportCount.description: The number of physical B_Ports available.

es1000PortHportCount.name: es1000PortHportCount
es1000PortHportCount.description: The number of physical H_Ports available.

es1000PortBportTable.name: es1000PortBportTable
es1000PortBportTable.description: A table that contains one entry for each B_Port.

es1000PortBportEntry.name: es1000PortBportEntry
es1000PortBportEntry.description: An entry containing the information for the B_Port.

es1000PortBportNumber.name: es1000PortBportNumber
es1000PortBportNumber.description: This object identifies the B_Port number.

es1000PortBportPhyState.name: es1000PortBportPhyState
es1000PortBportPhyState.description: This object identifies the physical state of the B_Port.

es1000PortBportOpStatus.name: es1000PortBportOpStatus
es1000PortBportOpStatus.description: This object identifies the operational status of the B_Port. The online(1) state indicates that user frames can be passed.

es1000PortBportAdmStatus.name: es1000PortBportAdmStatus
es1000PortBportAdmStatus.description: The desired state of the B_Port. A management station may place the B_Port in a desired state by setting this object accordingly. The testing(3) state indicates that no user frames can be passed. As the result of either explicit management action or per configuration information accessible by the B_Port, the es1000PortBportAdmStatus is changed to either the online(1) or testing(3) states, or remains in the offline(2) state.

es1000PortBportName.name: es1000PortBportName
es1000PortBportName.description: The desired name of the B_Port.

es1000PortBportBlockedState.name: es1000PortBportBlockedState
es1000PortBportBlockedState.description: The desired blocked state of the B_Port. Blocking a B_Port prevents it from communicating with its attached E_Port. A blocked B_Port will continuously transmit the Off-Line Sequence (OLS).

es1000PortHportTable.name: es1000PortHportTable
es1000PortHportTable.description: A table that contains one entry for each H_Port.

es1000PortHportEntry.name: es1000PortHportEntry
es1000PortHportEntry.description: An entry containing the information for the H_Port.

es1000PortHportNumber.name: es1000PortHportNumber
es1000PortHportNumber.description: This object identifies the H_Port number.

es1000PortHportPhyState.name: es1000PortHportPhyState
es1000PortHportPhyState.description: This object identifies the physical state of the H_Port.

es1000PortHportOpStatus.name: es1000PortHportOpStatus
es1000PortHportOpStatus.description: This object identifies the operational status of the H_Port. The online(1) state indicates that user frames can be passed.

es1000PortHportAdmStatus.name: es1000PortHportAdmStatus
es1000PortHportAdmStatus.description: The desired state of the H_Port. A management station may place the H_Port in a desired state by setting this object accordingly. The testing(3) state indicates that no user frames can be passed. As the result of either explicit management action or per configuration information accessible by the switch, the es1000PortHportAdmStatus is changed to either the online(1) or testing(3) states, or remains in the offline(2) state.

es1000PortHportName.name: es1000PortHportName
es1000PortHportName.description: The desired name of the H_Port.

es1000PortHportBypassedState.name: es1000PortHportBypassedState
es1000PortHportBypassedState.description: The desired bypassed state of the H_Port. Bypassing an H_Port prevents an attached device from communicating with the switch or communicating with any other device attached to the switch. Bypassing a port causes the incoming signal from an attached device to not placed on the Loop.

es1000PortHportValidation.name: es1000PortHportValidation
es1000PortHportValidation.description: The desired port validation state of the H_Port. If enabled, then a more rigorous process of validating the attached device is performed before insertion into the Loop.

es1000PortHportLipOnInsertion.name: es1000PortHportLipOnInsertion
es1000PortHportLipOnInsertion.description: The desired LIP on Insertion state of the H_Port. If enabled, a LIP will be automatically sent after any port insertion, port bypass, or manual GBIC installation or removal.

es1000LoopStatus.name: es1000LoopStatus
es1000LoopStatus.description: The current loop status of the switch. The values are defined as follows: DOWN(1), LIP(2), LISM(3), LIFA(4), LIPA(5), LIHA(6), LISA(7), LIRP(8), LILP(9), FAN(10), ACTIVE(11), and READY(12).

es1000LoopMasterWWN.name: es1000LoopMasterWWN
es1000LoopMasterWWN.description: The loop master worldwide name. If the loop master is unknown, then the worldwide name will be all zeros.

es1000LoopSwitched.name: es1000LoopSwitched
es1000LoopSwitched.description: Indicates whether switching mode is enabled. If enabled, each pair of communicating H_Ports may share the 100 Mbyte bandwidth. If not enabled, all devices on the loop share the 100 Mbyte bandwidth available on the loop.

es1000LoopPrincipal.name: es1000LoopPrincipal
es1000LoopPrincipal.description: Indicates whether the switch is operating as the principal ES-1000 on the loop.

es1000LoopPortTable.name: es1000LoopPortTable
es1000LoopPortTable.description: A table that contains the port-to-ALPA mapping for each H_Port on the loop.

es1000LoopPortEntry.name: es1000LoopPortEntry
es1000LoopPortEntry.description: An entry containing the ALPA information for the H_Port.

es1000LoopPortIndex.name: es1000LoopPortIndex
es1000LoopPortIndex.description: This object identifies the Loop port entry.

es1000LoopPortNumber.name: es1000LoopPortNumber
es1000LoopPortNumber.description: This object identifies the H_Port number.

es1000LoopPortALPA.name: es1000LoopPortALPA
es1000LoopPortALPA.description: This object identifies the ALPA's associated with the H_Port.

es1000AcctBportTable.name: es1000AcctBportTable
es1000AcctBportTable.description: A table that contains B_Port accounting information recorded since the switch IPL'd.

es1000AcctBportEntry.name: es1000AcctBportEntry
es1000AcctBportEntry.description: An entry containing accounting information for each B_Port.

es1000AcctBportNumber.name: es1000AcctBportNumber
es1000AcctBportNumber.description: This object identifies the B_Port number.

es1000AcctBportLinkFailures.name: es1000AcctBportLinkFailures
es1000AcctBportLinkFailures.description: This object counts the number of Link Failures detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportSyncLosses.name: es1000AcctBportSyncLosses
es1000AcctBportSyncLosses.description: This object counts the number of loss of synchronization detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportSigLosses.name: es1000AcctBportSigLosses
es1000AcctBportSigLosses.description: This object counts the number of loss of signal detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportPrimSeqProtoErrors.name: es1000AcctBportPrimSeqProtoErrors
es1000AcctBportPrimSeqProtoErrors.description: This object counts the number of primitive sequence protocol errors detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportInvalidTxWords.name: es1000AcctBportInvalidTxWords
es1000AcctBportInvalidTxWords.description: This object counts the number of invalid transmission words detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportInvalidCrcs.name: es1000AcctBportInvalidCrcs
es1000AcctBportInvalidCrcs.description: This object counts the number of invalid CRC detected by this B_Port for frames received.

es1000AcctBportLinkResetIns.name: es1000AcctBportLinkResetIns
es1000AcctBportLinkResetIns.description: This object counts the number of Link Reset Protocol received by this B_Port from the attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportLinkResetOuts.name: es1000AcctBportLinkResetOuts
es1000AcctBportLinkResetOuts.description: This object counts the number of Link Reset Protocol issued by this B_Port to the attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportOlsIns.name: es1000AcctBportOlsIns
es1000AcctBportOlsIns.description: This object counts the number of Offline Sequence (OLS) received by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportOlsOuts.name: es1000AcctBportOlsOuts
es1000AcctBportOlsOuts.description: This object counts the number of Offline Sequence (OLS) issued by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2InFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC2InFrames
es1000AcctBportC2InFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2OutFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC2OutFrames
es1000AcctBportC2OutFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frames delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2Discards.name: es1000AcctBportC2Discards
es1000AcctBportC2Discards.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frames discarded by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2InOctets.name: es1000AcctBportC2InOctets
es1000AcctBportC2InOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2OutOctets.name: es1000AcctBportC2OutOctets
es1000AcctBportC2OutOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3InFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC3InFrames
es1000AcctBportC3InFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3OutFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC3OutFrames
es1000AcctBportC3OutFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frames delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3InOctets.name: es1000AcctBportC3InOctets
es1000AcctBportC3InOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3OutOctets.name: es1000AcctBportC3OutOctets
es1000AcctBportC3OutOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3Discards.name: es1000AcctBportC3Discards
es1000AcctBportC3Discards.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frames discarded by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportRxWords.name: es1000AcctBportRxWords
es1000AcctBportRxWords.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel words, including the frame delimeters, received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportTxWords.name: es1000AcctBportTxWords
es1000AcctBportTxWords.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportRxFrames.name: es1000AcctBportRxFrames
es1000AcctBportRxFrames.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportTxFrames.name: es1000AcctBportTxFrames
es1000AcctBportTxFrames.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel frames delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportInvalidOrderedSets.name: es1000AcctBportInvalidOrderedSets
es1000AcctBportInvalidOrderedSets.description: This object counts the number of invalid Ordered Sets received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportFramesTooLong.name: es1000AcctBportFramesTooLong
es1000AcctBportFramesTooLong.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel over length frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportFramesTooShort.name: es1000AcctBportFramesTooShort
es1000AcctBportFramesTooShort.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel truncated frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportTxThroughput.name: es1000AcctBportTxThroughput
es1000AcctBportTxThroughput.description: This object presents the Bps transmission rate for this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportRxThroughput.name: es1000AcctBportRxThroughput
es1000AcctBportRxThroughput.description: This object presents the Bps reception rate for this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportAddressErrors.name: es1000AcctBportAddressErrors
es1000AcctBportAddressErrors.description: This object counts the number of Address errors detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2FbsyFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC2FbsyFrames
es1000AcctBportC2FbsyFrames.description: This object counts the number of F_BSY frames generated by this B_Port against Class 2 frames.

es1000AcctBportC2FrjtFrames.name: es1000AcctBportC2FrjtFrames
es1000AcctBportC2FrjtFrames.description: This object counts the number of F_RJT frames generated by this B_Port against Class 2 frames.

es1000AcctBportCFInFrames.name: es1000AcctBportCFInFrames
es1000AcctBportCFInFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class F frames received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportFramesDiscarded.name: es1000AcctBportFramesDiscarded
es1000AcctBportFramesDiscarded.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel frames that this B_Port has discarded.

es1000AcctBportInvalidClassofFrame.name: es1000AcctBportInvalidClassofFrame
es1000AcctBportInvalidClassofFrame.description: This object counts the number of Invalid Class of frame detected by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2RxWords.name: es1000AcctBportC2RxWords
es1000AcctBportC2RxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame words, including the frame delimeters, received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC2TxWords.name: es1000AcctBportC2TxWords
es1000AcctBportC2TxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3RxWords.name: es1000AcctBportC3RxWords
es1000AcctBportC3RxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame words, including the frame delimeters, received by this B_Port from its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportC3TxWords.name: es1000AcctBportC3TxWords
es1000AcctBportC3TxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this B_Port to its attached E_Port.

es1000AcctBportTxThroughputPercent.name: es1000AcctBportTxThroughputPercent
es1000AcctBportTxThroughputPercent.description: This object presents the percentage of transmission bandwidth used by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportRxThroughputPercent.name: es1000AcctBportRxThroughputPercent
es1000AcctBportRxThroughputPercent.description: This object presents the percentage of reception bandwidth used by this B_Port.

es1000AcctBportLinkDown.name: es1000AcctBportLinkDown
es1000AcctBportLinkDown.description: This object counts the number of times the B_Port has detected a link down condition.

es1000AcctHportTable.name: es1000AcctHportTable
es1000AcctHportTable.description: A table that contains H_Port accounting information recorded since the switch IPL'd.

es1000AcctHportEntry.name: es1000AcctHportEntry
es1000AcctHportEntry.description: An entry containing accounting information for each H_Port.

es1000AcctHportNumber.name: es1000AcctHportNumber
es1000AcctHportNumber.description: This object identifies the H_Port number.

es1000AcctHportLinkFailures.name: es1000AcctHportLinkFailures
es1000AcctHportLinkFailures.description: This object counts the number of Link Failures detected by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportSyncLosses.name: es1000AcctHportSyncLosses
es1000AcctHportSyncLosses.description: This object counts the number of loss of synchronization detected by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportSigLosses.name: es1000AcctHportSigLosses
es1000AcctHportSigLosses.description: This object counts the number of loss of signal detected by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportInvalidTxWords.name: es1000AcctHportInvalidTxWords
es1000AcctHportInvalidTxWords.description: This object counts the number of invalid transmission words detected by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportInvalidCrcs.name: es1000AcctHportInvalidCrcs
es1000AcctHportInvalidCrcs.description: This object counts the number of invalid CRC detected by this H_Port for frames received.

es1000AcctHportC2InFrames.name: es1000AcctHportC2InFrames
es1000AcctHportC2InFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frames received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC2OutFrames.name: es1000AcctHportC2OutFrames
es1000AcctHportC2OutFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frames delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC2InOctets.name: es1000AcctHportC2InOctets
es1000AcctHportC2InOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC2OutOctets.name: es1000AcctHportC2OutOctets
es1000AcctHportC2OutOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3InFrames.name: es1000AcctHportC3InFrames
es1000AcctHportC3InFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frames received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3OutFrames.name: es1000AcctHportC3OutFrames
es1000AcctHportC3OutFrames.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frames delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3InOctets.name: es1000AcctHportC3InOctets
es1000AcctHportC3InOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3OutOctets.name: es1000AcctHportC3OutOctets
es1000AcctHportC3OutOctets.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame octets (bytes), including the frame delimeters, delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportRxWords.name: es1000AcctHportRxWords
es1000AcctHportRxWords.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel words, including the frame delimeters, received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportTxWords.name: es1000AcctHportTxWords
es1000AcctHportTxWords.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportRxFrames.name: es1000AcctHportRxFrames
es1000AcctHportRxFrames.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel frames received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportTxFrames.name: es1000AcctHportTxFrames
es1000AcctHportTxFrames.description: This object counts the number of Fibre Channel frames delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportTxThroughput.name: es1000AcctHportTxThroughput
es1000AcctHportTxThroughput.description: This object presents the Bps transmission rate for this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportRxThroughput.name: es1000AcctHportRxThroughput
es1000AcctHportRxThroughput.description: This object presents the Bps reception rate for this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC2RxWords.name: es1000AcctHportC2RxWords
es1000AcctHportC2RxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 frame words, including the frame delimeters, received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC2TxWords.name: es1000AcctHportC2TxWords
es1000AcctHportC2TxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 2 words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3RxWords.name: es1000AcctHportC3RxWords
es1000AcctHportC3RxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 frame words, including the frame delimeters, received by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportC3TxWords.name: es1000AcctHportC3TxWords
es1000AcctHportC3TxWords.description: This object counts the number of Class 3 words, including the frame delimeters, delivered through this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportTxThroughputPercent.name: es1000AcctHportTxThroughputPercent
es1000AcctHportTxThroughputPercent.description: This object presents the percentage of transmission bandwidth used by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportRxThroughputPercent.name: es1000AcctHportRxThroughputPercent
es1000AcctHportRxThroughputPercent.description: This object presents the percentage of reception bandwidth used by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportLIPCount.name: es1000AcctHportLIPCount
es1000AcctHportLIPCount.description: This object counts the number of LIPs detected by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportConnectionsMade.name: es1000AcctHportConnectionsMade
es1000AcctHportConnectionsMade.description: This object counts the number of connections made by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportConnectionsStalled.name: es1000AcctHportConnectionsStalled
es1000AcctHportConnectionsStalled.description: This object counts the number of connections stalled by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportConnectionsAborted.name: es1000AcctHportConnectionsAborted
es1000AcctHportConnectionsAborted.description: This object counts the number of connections aborted by this H_Port.

es1000AcctHportConnectionsAccepted.name: es1000AcctHportConnectionsAccepted
es1000AcctHportConnectionsAccepted.description: This object counts the number of connections accepted by this H_Port.

es1000PortBportScn.name: es1000PortBportScn
es1000PortBportScn.description: A es1000PortBportScn is generated whenever a B_Port changes its operational state. For instance, the B_Port goes from online to offline.

es1000PortHportScn.name: es1000PortHportScn
es1000PortHportScn.description: A es1000PortHportScn is generated whenever a H_Port changes its operational state. For instance, the H_Port goes from online to offline.

es1000CompScn.name: es1000CompScn
es1000CompScn.description: A es1000CompScn is generated whenever a COMPONENT status changes its operational state.
